short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Passport by Metasafe-protects your data with the same tech used to secure cryptocurrency & makes password management easier & safer

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PASSPORT protects your data with the same tech used to secure cryptocurrency.

Most things you do online require you to create a password. They provide protection, but passwords can be a real pain to keep track of.

The PASSPORT app makes password management easier and safer than ever.

The Password Problem
Q: The average person juggles 10 passwords across 100+ websites and online accounts.
Q: Most people use (and re-use) weak password patterns hoping to make them easier to remember.
Q: Password managers help, but store your data in ways that are prone to hacking. And what's scarier than having your password hacked? Having ALL your passwords hacked.

The PASSPORT Solution
A: Login to any website and your Passport saves your password. You don't have to enter your password to that site again, even on other devices.
A: Unlock your Passport using your smartphone with a convenient face or thumbprint scan.
A: Using blockchain technology, your passwords are NOT stored anywhere hackers can break into them. They’re also protected by a secret key that only YOU have access to.

Highest Level of Data Protection
There are dozens of password managers out there,
but none protect your data like PASSPORT.

- Your data is never stored in a single place or central server that criminals can hack.
- PASSPORT hides your data everywhere in an impenetrable way that would take even the most powerful computers decades to figure out (AES-256 Encryption).
- You have total data ownership because it's locked down by your Master Key. Without your key, no one can recover your account access... Not even our PASSPORT team.
- Blockchain technology prevents anyone from altering or destroying your data.

Ditch the ‘Forgot My Password Link
- Once you save a website password in PASSPORT, you won’t have to enter it again, even on your other devices.
- Log in to PASSPORT instantly and securely with a face or thumbprint scan.
- Import credentials from your current password manager… PASSPORT is the last you’ll ever need. Passwords sync across your devices, so you’ll never have to worry about remembering a password again.
